summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest (west side only), from West Dakota Street to West Andover Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise imrpoving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14577 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
